page.title: 06FARMING C. CROOKHAM
page.content: Many of the farms in this area are no longer worked as true farms. At {Velmead Farm}if the council give permission the land is to be used for residential building.Seymour farm has no stock or machinery they only grow wheat as a crop.Homecroft farm is not a working farm anymore because the owners of the farm are now retired, but it is the base of a haulage company_Cranstone Brothers_who also work the Eocean gravel deposites. {Beacon Hill}is a farm where they only keep horses.The horses are well cared for.Freelands is also a farm that only keeps horses but it used to be used as a working farm because the milking stables are still standing.Stillers farm is a dairy farm with a fresian herd.The s.w.is good arable land and fields cover most of this part.
